pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power Calculations for Two-Sample Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney Test // Software for power calculations for two-sample Wilcoxon-Mann- Whitney test for a continuous outcome (Mann and Whitney 1947) doi:10.1214/aoms/1177730491, (Shieh, Jan, and Randles 2006) doi:10.1080/10485250500473099.
